Comments
February 25, 2021
specialmagic
My biggest want from this set was this version of the FF. This piece is the most disappointing of a pretty disappointing line-up. The others can at least be useful, but poor Scott got no respect. It's probably too much to hope we'll ever get a good version of this iteration of the character now.
February 25, 2021
Jarosa
You get 9 clicks for 75 points would be impressive if there wasn't other 9 click 75 point characters WAY better than Scott. His damage is where he is lackluster. Your opponent can just ignore him if they brought armor and take care of him last. He does have leadership which is useful. He does get outwit and precision strike so he isn't totally inept. He is relegated to handling pogs and support pieces.
February 20, 2021
KillerKing
75 point dial to round out the She-Hulk, Ms. Thing and Medusa team. Unfortunately he doesn't bring anything really worthwhile for his points.
February 16, 2021
nlegore
I wish this would have protrayed Ant-Man from the FF book better. He should have had a special power that turns him standard size but he can use Close Combat Expert.
February 11, 2021
Goop
Dont like this dial at all. Stealth/poison/leadership, what exactly do i do with that? 19def is great, 21 actually at range if you are in hindering cause he's tiny but only 4 range? You do get some outwit in the middle but no damage higher than 2 the entire dial? For a harasser piece 75pts is a bit much. The 4 reroll is nice but SheHulk and Ms Thing have it too and are FAR more useful for the same points.
